Uses of Package
com.erudika.para.core.listeners

Packages that use com.erudika.para.core.listeners
Package
Description
com.erudika.para.core
Core domain classes for modeling the Para domain space.
com.erudika.para.core.listeners
Listeners package.
com.erudika.para.core.utils
Utility classes.
  • Classes in com.erudika.para.core.listeners used by com.erudika.para.core
    Class
    Description
    AppCreatedListener
    This listener is executed when a new child App is created.
    AppDeletedListener
    This listener is executed when a new child App is deleted.
    AppSettingAddedListener
    This listener is executed when a setting is added to an application.
    AppSettingRemovedListener
    This listener is executed when a setting is removed from an application.
  • Classes in com.erudika.para.core.listeners used by com.erudika.para.core.listeners
    Class
    Description
    IOListener
    Listens for create/read/update/delete events when DAO is called.
  • Classes in com.erudika.para.core.listeners used by com.erudika.para.core.utils
    Class
    Description
    DestroyListener
    This listener is executed when the Para.destroy() is called.
    InitializeListener
    This listener is executed when the Para.initialize() is called.
    IOListener
    Listens for create/read/update/delete events when DAO is called.
